item.title: Workshop Details
item.description: (placeholder text below that needs editing) Pre-work Please do the requested Git/GitHub prep in advance! Go here for details. If you have questions, please ask on the community.rstudio.com thread. We will hold a Session Zero February 28 at 3-4 pm to help orient everyone to course expectations, check your set-up, assess needs and vote on some optional topics to address. Please attend if you can. Schedule Monday, February 28 15:00 - 16:00 Session Zero (optional, but recommended)
